title: Adani-Hindenburg case: SC reserves judgment, CJI indicates at passing directions to SEBI
selftext: Keywords: Reserved judgment or reserved decision: a judgment that is not given immediately after the conclusion of the hearing or trial. A reserved judgment may be released days, weeks, or even months after the hearing.
comments: Yeah pretty much but even SEBI's powers are limited by parliament recently to prevent investigation in such cases.
